title: win10版上能装mod吗
author: 轩辕Shi
txt_content: win10版上能装mod吗？如果能，能不能发一点pe上比较有名的mod的下载链接？

replies.author: zt麦块
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-3-22 17:12
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-875598-1-1.html

https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=forumdisplay&fid=3 ...
这是add不是mod

replies.author: Magma_
replies.txt_content:
zt麦块 发表于 2020-3-23 08:12
这是add不是mod
add按照MinecraftWiki的定义实际上是mod，基岩版mod

replies.txt_content:
